title: Re-Engineering the Corporation
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: A number of papers came from this seminar series. The most interesting was one around Women on Boards and the so-called Business Case. The principal finding was that a literature search did not support a business case for women on boards and an empirical examination of FTSE 100 listed companies revealed a sectoral imbalance between women on boards as non-execs and all male boards. Might be of use to those trying to use quota arguments for female participation.
